title: Guava Cuban Pastry (Pastelito de Guayaba)
ingredients: 1 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2: Cut guava paste into 18 thin slices.

Step 3: Unroll puff pastry and cut into 18 squares. Place a thin slice of guava paste onto each square and fold pastry piece over to make a triangle. Using a fork, pinch the edges of the triangle together. Brush with beaten egg and sprinkle with sugar if you like.
Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until puffed and golden, 20 to 25 minutes.
